ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Mage weaponry
ygData.msgSnippet: a mage carrying a weapon?, what a strange thing. you would be better getting a stien of Moggock (+10INT) and either some kind of book or other held +int/Mana
ygData.messageBody:
a mage carrying a weapon?, what a strange thing. you would be better getting a stien of Moggock (+10INT) and either some kind of book or other held +int/Mana item and of course your focus items, which all do about 6dmg if you really really must melee. better to let your pet melee or get a meat shield cos u won't last long in fist fight anyway since mages have next to no AC/HP

>From: "kosingigglephitz"
>Reply-To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
>To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: [EverQuest] Mage weaponry
>Date: Fri, 26 Jul 2002 14:27:20 -0000
>
>I know that Mages can't really weild a 2 handed bastard sword but
>what i was wondering, other than the cheesy dagger, what weaponry can
>a Mage Use? Can they use a mace, a club, a better dagger at least? I
>tried getting my Mage a parrying dagger but I could't equip that
>item.
>
